summary: 5 TIMES NOW THE CAR WILL NOT MOVE IT SAYS CHECK TRANSMISSION THIS HAS HAPPENED IN MIDDLE OF HIGHWAY AND IN THE MIDDLE OF TOWN IN TRAFFIC CHRYSLER HAS RESET AND REPLACED TRANSMISSION MODULES AND IT IS STILL DOING IT! THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS! ON THE ROAD YOU SLOW TO A STOP IT IDLES DOWN AND GOES TO CHECK TRANSMISSION AND WILL NOT MOVE EITHER GET IT PUSHED OUT OF THE WAY OR HAD TO ROLL BACKWARDS OUT OF TRAFFIC AT A LIGHT. ONCE HAD TO PUSH ACROSS 4 LANES OF ROAD TO GET OUT OF TRAFFIC AGAIN ROLLED UP TO A STOP IT LT WOULD NOT GO INTO GEAR FORWARDS OR BACK!
